entry.title: $2395 // *NO FEE*Renovated 1BR in PRIME Upper East Side steps from Q/6 trains!
entry.content:
*NO FEE* BE THE FIRST TO SEE THIS UPPER EAST SIDE GEM!

Huge UES 1BR - Renovated - Steps from the Q/6 trains.
- Entryway foyer with 2 deep closets
- Separate eat-in kitchen with full-size Stainless Steel appliances + dishwasher
- Massive living room
- Giant sleeping alcove that easily fits a Queen bed + dresser
- Located in well-maintained building
- Pet friendly
- NO FEE

Areas of interest: Central Park, The Metropolitan Museum of Art, the Guggenheim, 86th Street, 2nd Avenue.

One of the most affluent neighborhoods in New York City. Lined to the east by Central Park, the cities largest green space. Home to the Mayor, World class museums (Museum Mile), lively restaurants, shopping and brunch spots. Make one of the best timeless New York neighborhoods your playground today!

Contact me today to schedule a viewing, and find the perfect home!
Jada Young
Call/text: (804) 921-2982
Licensed Real Estate Salesperson
Crosstown Apartments NYC

Not the perfect home for you? Check out the link to view more: https://newyork.craigslist.org/search/aap?query=jada&availabilityMode=0&sale_date=all+dates

OR Contact me to discuss our 15,000 other listings!
